Texts.Chs: ... 现在谁去把坚果和螺栓倒进一个完美的麦片碗里了？
Texts.Eng: ... Now who went and dumped their nuts and bolts into a perfectly good cereal bowl?

Texts.Chs: 机械螺栓，因为当你饿得醒来的时候，你根本不在乎你嘴里放的是什么！
Texts.Eng: Bolt O's, for when you wake up so hungry you don't care what you're putting in your mouth!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人不想得手足搐搦症。。。
Texts.Eng: Floran isn't looking to get tetanusss...

Texts.Chs: 为什么有那么多其他的种族对机械螺栓持批评态度？他们是一个很好的谷物品牌！
Texts.Eng: Why are so many other races critical of Bolt O's? They're a fine cereal brand!
